Package hc.server.msb

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Converter
    Converter is useful to convert data format between Robot and Device, if data format exchanged between them is inconsistent.
    Device
    In most cases, a real device provides one function.
    DeviceCompatibleDescription  
    Message
    Message is medium between Robot and Device.
    Robot
    Robot is a intelligent control unit, which manage zero or multiple Device(s).
    RobotEvent  
    RobotListener
